mapper.select: select b.articleNo, b.email, b.subject, b.content, b.ripple, b.hit, b.registerTime from community b order by articleNo desc
select r.rippleNo, r.email, r.content, r.registerTime from community c join ripple r on c.articleNo = r.articleNo where #{articleNo} = r.articleNo order by r.rippleNo desc
mapper.update: UPDATE community SET ripple = ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ripple r WHERE community.articleNo = r.articleNo ) WHERE articleNo = #{articleNo}
mapper.insert: insert into ripple (articleNo, email, content, registerTime) values (${articleNo}, #{email}, #{content}, now())
insert into community (email, subject, content, hit, registerTime) values (#{email}, #{subject}, #{content}, 0, now())
